A

ATTRIBUTE_MESSAGE - Static variable in class com.netheos.servlets.FAQServlet
Name of the attribute send to JSP through request dispatching, it contains the server response and will be displayed in the final HTML

F

FAQServlet - Class in com.netheos.servlets

G

getFAQMatches(String, String) - Method in class com.netheos.db.DatabaseAccessor
Returns a list of FAQ when either the question or answer contains the given String
getInstance() - Static method in class com.netheos.db.DatabaseAccessor
Returns the singleton instance, creating it first if it doesn't exist
getWholeCollection(String, String) - Method in class com.netheos.db.DatabaseAccessor
Returns all documents from the collection with provided name, in provided format.

H

hasAdminAccess(String, String) - Static method in class com.netheos.SecurityManager
Depending on the solution eventually chosen, this method could check a user database for admin rights.

I

insertNewFAQ(String, String, List<String>) - Method in class com.netheos.db.DatabaseAccessor
Insert in the database a couple question/answer, along with given tags.

J

JSON_FORMAT - Static variable in class com.netheos.servlets.FAQServlet
One of the accepted formats for the server response (actually the only one as of now)
JSP_URL - Static variable in class com.netheos.servlets.FAQServlet
URL to the view

M

P

PARAMETER_STRING_ANSWER - Static variable in class com.netheos.servlets.FAQServlet
 
PARAMETER_STRING_FORMAT - Static variable in class com.netheos.servlets.FAQServlet
Name of the parameter specifying what format should be used to return the data (ex : json)
PARAMETER_STRING_MATCH - Static variable in class com.netheos.servlets.FAQServlet
Name of the parameter specifying what part of the question/answer should be present to be returned to the user
PARAMETER_STRING_PASSWORD - Static variable in class com.netheos.servlets.FAQServlet
Name of the parameter specifying password (not safe, @see com.netheos.SecurityManager)
PARAMETER_STRING_QUESTION - Static variable in class com.netheos.servlets.FAQServlet

Name of the parameter specifying the use case
PARAMETER_STRING_TAGS - Static variable in class com.netheos.servlets.FAQServlet
 
PARAMETER_STRING_USERNAME - Static variable in class com.netheos.servlets.FAQServlet

R
